title: Honestly the best way to win is just peel for the ADC you can even be lazy about it
body:
the other day i played {{champion:61}} mid the usual just playing safe farming them all hell broke loose team fights started and it was a scary bit. However all i did was just shield the ADC and give him movement speed i was just chilling in the back i didn't even have to bother to set up an ult i just kept the ball on him and did nothing else. ( lost that match due to the other 3 running around thinking we had too much of a lead and dived )

Then today i had a {{champion:72}}  match a bit ago all i did was sit next to lucian and ult or stun if someone got on him i don't even have to run around and engage all i need to do is scare them

Lastly i just played a {{champion:9}} and in the mid game i realized i don't have to put myself in danger to ult. I just need to fear and silence for my vayne. So that's it, you wanna win? use your CC to defend the adc don't get in danger to make plays. I was fed too but was not doing shit in comparison, worker harder than i needed to. All i needed was 2 buttons.
